esp:page.esp:name: Museums holding Nimrud objects
esp:page.esp:title: Museums and collections holding objects from Nimrud

body.p: Objects from the archaeological site of Nimrud (ancient Kalhu) now reside in museum collections across the world. This section currently lists 77 museums that hold material from Nimrud and provides links to online catalogue information where available. As the Nimrud project focuses on museums in the UK, these are listed separately from museums worldwide.

li.esp:link: Museums in the United Kingdom holding Nimrud material
Nimrud objects at Cambridge's Museum of Archaeology and Anthropology

body.p: You can also search or browse the Nimrud Inscribed Objects Database.
